attributes.action: eradicate the 3,700 acres of opium fields reported in Britain, in the Mail on Sunday (13/4/08)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Prime Minister had ever seen a neonate of a drug user withdraw from heroin, he probably would sign my petition himself.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
